page.title: 02Employment in Willingham
page.content: The village itself provides employment for some of the residents with its shops, small firms and businesses. While some men work at home, others work in{Cambridge}and the neighbouring villages and even in{London.}Most men work full time while many women tend to work part time. Many men are involved in{market {gardening and farming.}Some of this work is seasonal. The other main occupation is{office work.}Most women are either housewives or work in{shops or offices. The other main occupations are factory work and the transport and construction industries. There are some{professional people}such as teachers, architects and engineers as well as skilled and semi-skilled jobs such as catering. There is little unemployment in Willingham.
